thread.title: Pascagoula picks up 27-13 Homecoming win over Stone | gulflive.com
thread.title_full: Pascagoula picks up 27-13 Homecoming win over Stone | gulflive.com

author: Curtis Rockwell
title: Pascagoula picks up 27-13 Homecoming win over Stone | gulflive.com
text:
Pascagoula picked up a Homecoming win Friday night, holding off a scrappy Stone County squad 27-13 at War Memorial Stadium.
With the win, the Panthers remain perfect in Region 4-5A at 2-0 and Pascagoula moves to 4-2 overall. The Tomcats drop to 0-2 in league play and are 2-4 overall.
This story will be updated.
